textTemplates.description: The text of the Description/Comments field on the task associated to the lead with an Agent Connection AIP that has not yet had an opp generated.
textTemplates.name: NoOppLeadTaskComments
textTemplates.text: This is an automated alert to let you know that {!GetLeadIdsfromAIPsLoopVariable.Compass_Agent_Name__c} made a successful AIP introduction to {!GetLeadIdsfromAIPsLoopVariable.Non_Compass_Agent_Agnostic_Name__c} on {!GetLeadIdsfromAIPsLoopVariable.Date_of_Introduction__c}, and there hasn’t been an opportunity created yet. Agent Connection: {!GetLeadIdsfromAIPsLoopVariable.Record_Link__c}. This could be a good time to connect with {!GetLeadIdsfromAIPsLoopVariable.Compass_Agent_Name__c} to evaluate if they can help reengage this prospect. Best of luck! AIP Team

textTemplates.name: tmplt_Failure_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
AIP Admins,


The daily job to process AIP Lifecycle notifications and updates failed. Contact your admin for assistance.


Current record: https://compassrealestate.lightning.force.com/{!$Flow.CurrentRecord}


Current day/time: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}


Error Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

textTemplates.name: tmplt_Record_Thresdhold_Exceeded_Body
textTemplates.text:
AIP Admins,


The number of AIP records that need the Compass Agent: Compass Email field populated ({!varEligibleRecordsCounter}) exceeds the threshold set in the system ({!final_Record_Count_Threshold}), so no notifications will be triggered. Salesforce flow loop elements can only handle up to 2,000 records.


To resolve this, please have the Compass Agent: Compass Email field dataloaded onto all Agent Connection records where it's blank and ask a Salesforce admin/dev to manually run this flow again. The SF dev/admin may need to clone this scheduled flow as an autolaunched flow, and then run it once. Emails in the AIP lifecycle will then be triggered.

textTemplates.name: tmplt_Record_Threshold_Exceeded_Subject
textTemplates.text: Expiring AIP Introductions - Job Exceeded Record Threshold

textTemplates.name: tmplt_Summary_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
AIP Admins, {!X12DayCounter} introduction reminders were sent to agents. {!X16DayCounter} submission closing reminders were sent to agents. {!X30DayCounter} Introduction Confirmed fields were updated to 'Submission Closed'. {!LeadLoopCounter} tasks were created on leads where no opp exists on the related Agent Connection. {!AgentJoinedLoopCounter} agent joined emails were sent to agents. {!IneligibleJoinedLoopCounter} bonus ineligible emails were sent to agents. {!varEmailsSentCounter} expiration notices were sent to agents. {!IntroExpiredCounter} introduction expired notices were sent to agents.
SF Admins: {!varEligibleRecordsCounter} AIP records have had the Compass Agent's Email written to the Compass Agent: Compass Email field on the AIP record.

textTemplates.name: userChatterNotificationTemplate
textTemplates.text: You have 1 or more agent introductions expiring in the next 30 days. Please see this report for more details: https://compassrealestate.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O4N000004RlseUAC/view

variables.description: Create these tasks on leads to remind agent that no opp has been created for AIPs that were submitted/introduced
